org.kepler.ddp.director

Class DDPDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.kernel.util.NamedObj
      • ptolemy.kernel.util.Attribute
        • ptolemy.actor.Director
          • org.kepler.ddp.director.DDPDirector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Executable, Initializable, Changeable, Debuggable, DebugListener, Derivable, ModelErrorHandler, MoMLExportable, Moveable, Nameable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HadoopDirector, StratosphereDirector

    public class DDPDirector
extends Director
    A director that converts DDP pattern actors (Map, Reduce, Cross, CoGroup, and Match) and I/O actors (DDPDataSink and DDPDataSource) into a job that is executed on a DDP engine such as Hadoop or Stratosphere.

    NOTE: Only DDP pattern and I/O actors may be present in the workflow. Other actors must placed inside the composite pattern actors or in a different sub-workflow.

    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

    • Field Detail

      • configDir

        public StringParameter configDir
        DDP engine configuration directory.

      • degreeOfParallelism

        public Parameter degreeOfParallelism
        The default degree of parallelism for ddp pattern actors. This value is used if the actor's degreeOfParallelism <= 0.

      • includeJars

        public StringParameter includeJars
        A comma-separated list of jar files to include. If the absolute path to the jar is not specified, then the jar should be located in a Kepler module.

      • jobArguments

        public StringParameter jobArguments
        A comma-separated list of arguments for the job. It is only useful when DDP actors' logics are described by java classes, not sub-workflows.

      • displayRedirectDir

        public StringParameter displayRedirectDir
        The directory where the display related actors in DDP pattern sub-workflows will save their outputs. If it is empty, the display actors will be discarded before execution. More information about display redirect can be found at display-redirect module.

      • writeSubWorkflowsToFiles

        public Parameter writeSubWorkflowsToFiles
        If true, sub-workflows are written to files in a directory. The directory path is printed to stdout when the workflow executes.

      • engine

        public StringParameter engine
        The execution engine.

      • startServerType

        public StringParameter startServerType
        The type of DDP server to start (if one is not running).

      • SAME_JVM_STRING

        public static final java.lang.String SAME_JVM_STRING
        String for serverType parameter for running DDP Engine in the same JVM.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISTRIBUTED_STRING

        public static final java.lang.String DISTRIBUTED_STRING
        String for serverType parameter for running DDP Engine in a distributed environment.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_INTTOKEN

        public static final IntToken DEFAULT_INTTOKEN
        The value used to signify the default degree of parallelism for the degreeOfParallelism parameter.

      • DEFAULT_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_NAME
        The name of the DEFAULT degree of parallelism parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
